item.title: Intro
item.description: Me I’m just a computer science guy that likes graphics and music. This Blog This blog was created mostly to kill some time and write some stuff, so I don’t really expect to get attention or many readers. Most posts here will probably be about computer graphics or any other thing I get interested in. The Content I don’t know man, interesting stuff to you, I hope.

item.title: About me
item.description: Me? I’m just another boring computer science student that started programming at his teenage years and ended up sucked by the rabbit hole. What do I do? I study CS, mostly computer graphics, but also compiler construction, operating systems and systems programming as a whole. I also study music by myself and play guitar. More about me? Well… 21 yo. Live in Brazil. Hate webdev. Aiming to get a degree in CS at the University of Bras√≠lia.
